lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "This explains why the LDP failed to regain governorships in the most hotly contested constituencies of Fukuoka and Hokkaido, where the shipbuilding and steel industries are suffering heavily from the yen's extended rise," he said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: He said additional government borrowing would place no burden on the capital market because it has amassed huge excess funds and government bond prices have risen to record levels lately.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The LDP's failure to win seats in some crucial local constituencies will weaken the government's ability to push through its tax plan, and without a compromise tax proposal the budget for fiscal 1987/88 ending March 31 is unlikely to be passed soon, they said.
